conbody.p: Yesod adheres to the following tenets of REST:

ul.li: Each resource should have precisely one URL.
Allow multiple representations of data on the same URL.
Inspect request headers to determine extra information about what the client wants.

conbody.p: This makes it easy to use Yesod not just for building websites, but for building APIs. In fact, using techniques such as RepHtmlJson, you can serve both a user-friendly, HTML page and a machine-friendly, JSON page from the same URL.
